newsitem.title: USA: Check Point, 3Com in firewall pact.
newsitem.headline: Check Point, 3Com in firewall pact.

text.p: Check Point Software Technologies Ltd on Monday said it has entered into an agreement with 3Com Corp to link Check Point's security software framework with 3Com Corp's Internet firewall.
Firewalls are the software programs that restrict the flow of information between a company's network and the Internet in order to keep sensitive information private.

Check Point said it will build in the capability to manage 3Com's NETBuilder IP firewall from its enterprise security management console software. In addition, 3Com will ship an evaluation copy of Check Point's management console with every NETBuilder router sold, Check Point said.
The agreement makes use of the Check Point's Open Platform for Secure Enterprise Connectivity, or OPSEC, framework, which was enables vendors to integrate check Point applicatiopns.
